name: Supabase
description: Supabase MCP integration for database operations, authentication, storage, and real-time subscriptions. Manage your Supabase projects, run SQL queries, and interact with your backend directly.
longDescription: Official Supabase MCP server for managing your backend from Claude Code. Run SQL queries, manage authentication and storage, configure real-time subscriptions, and interact with your Supabase project without switching to the dashboard.
